commentary: This just made people hate Vriska even more, when she grabbed his wheelchair and jerked him back and forth, making him apologize for the paralysis she deliberately inflicted on him. I can't imagine why. People are SO sensitive. Oh, here's the first appearance of my friend Dante Basco. It's a nice thought, Tavros, but even my boy Dante can't bail you out of the predicament caused by your jaw-dropping cowardice and lack of gratitude.
